bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with re li 熱痢 , heat free-flux illness. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥：冬瓜葉，積熱痢，拖麵食 , “[To cure] accumulated heat free-flux illness with dong gua leaves, consume them coated with flour”. Also: 柴胡， 積熱痢，同黃芩，半水半酒煎服 , “[To cure] accumulated heat freeflux illness with chai hu , ingest after boiling together with huang qin in [a liquid consisting of] half water half wine”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 further has 積熱下痢 , accumulated heat discharge free-flux illness, and 積熱瀉痢 , accumulated heat outflow freeflux illness.
